Articles.Content: This might be a dumb question, and I know I've seen it asked here before and I found the answer to not really explain much, however I'm curious as to how you go about officially accepting challenges and receiving the badges afterwards, or if all challenges even have badges, and how you go about displaying them. I've seen a few that I can easily accomplish and would like to do so, I'm just lost on the acceptance/reward aspect of them. Any help would be appreciated. Fly safe. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Just make an entry and post it to the challenge thread, the OP will hopefully tell you if your entry is accepted or not. It's not really all that formal.
Links to Badges(if there is one) are sent via private message so you can put them in your sig (at least that is how it happened with me)

Yep, it's totally on the honor system. You can always just link the badge image. But everyone who cares and tries to find your entry would know, and would probably follow you around the forums and mock you relentlessly, so faking it isn't worth it.

eg:![cavemanbadge_zpsjkijz0wr.jpg](http://i52.photobucket.com/albums/g13/GoSlash27/cavemanbadge_zpsjkijz0wr.jpg)
For displaying them go to settings (top right) and on the left side you can edit your signature. I have just copied and pasted my badges using chrome.
